name: py-pycosat

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
PicoSAT is a popular SAT solver written by Armin Biere in pure C. This
package provides efficient Python bindings to picosat on the C level,
i.e. when importing pycosat, the picosat solver becomes part of the
Python process itself. For ease of deployment, the picosat source
(namely picosat.c and picosat.h) is included in this project. These
files have been extracted from the picosat source (picosat-965.tar.gz).

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
